description.p: You can cast mage armor on yourself at will, without expending a spell slot or material components.

sheet.description: You can cast mage armor on yourself, without expending a spell slot or material components.

description.p: You no longer need sleep and can’t be forced to sleep by any means. To gain benefits of a long rest, you must still perform only light activity, such as reading a book or keeping watch.

sheet.description: You no longer need sleep and can’t be forced to sleep by any means. To gain benefits of a long rest, you must still perform only light activity, such as reading a book or keeping watch.

description.p: Once on each of your turns when you hit a creature with a ranged attack cantrip, you can move that creature in a straight line 10 feet closer to you.

sheet.description: Once on each of your turns when you hit a creature with a ranged attack cantrip, you can move that creature in a straight line 10 feet closer to you.

description.p: Whenever you cast a spell using a warlock spell slot, you gain advantage on the first ability check you make before the end of your next turn.

sheet.description: Whenever you cast a spell using a warlock spell slot, you gain advantage on the first ability check you make before the end of your next turn.

description.p: You can cast speak with animals at will, without expending a spell slot.

sheet.description: You can cast speak with animals, without expending a spell slot.

description.p: You gain proficiency in the Deception and Persuasion skills.
You can see normally in darkness, both magical and nonmagical, to a distance of 120 feet.

sheet.description: You can see normally in darkness, both magical and nonmagical, to a distance of 120 feet.

description.p: As an action, you can touch one unattended nonmagical object that weighs less than 10 pounds, such as a shield, gemstone, or glaive. The object disappears into a hidden pocket dimension. As an action on a subsequent turn, you can access this pocket dimension to retrieve the item. You can have only one item stored at a time, and an item that is under the effects of a magical spell or effect cannot be stored. If you die or are reduced to 0 hit points, the item exits the pocket dimension and falls to the ground in your space.

sheet.description: You can touch one unattended nonmagical object that weighs less than 10 pounds, such as a shield, gemstone, or glaive. The object disappears into a hidden pocket dimension. As an action on a subsequent turn, you can access this pocket dimension to retrieve the item. You can have only one item stored at a time, and an item that is under the effects of a magical spell or effect cannot be stored.

description.p: Any creature that can understand a language can understand what you say.

sheet.description: Any creature that can understand a language can understand what you say.

description.p: You can cast detect magic at will, without expending a spell slot.

sheet.description: You can cast detect magic, without expending a spell slot.

description.p: You can read all writing.

sheet.description: You can read all writing.

description.p: You can cast false life on yourself at will as a 1st-level spell, without expending a spell slot or material components.

sheet.description: You can cast false life on yourself as a 1st-level spell, without expending a spell slot or material components.

description.p: You can use your action to touch a willing humanoid and perceive through its senses until the end of your next turn. As long as the creature is on the same plane of existence as you, you can use your action on subsequent turns to maintain this connection, extending the duration until the end of your next turn. While perceiving through the other creature’s senses, you benefit from any special senses possessed by that creature, and you are blinded and deafened to your own surroundings.

sheet.description: You touch a willing humanoid and perceive through its senses until the end of your next turn. As long as the creature is on the same plane of existence as you, you can use your action on subsequent turns to maintain this connection, extending the duration until the end of your next turn. While perceiving through the other creature’s senses, you benefit from any special senses possessed by that creature, and you are blinded and deafened to your own surroundings.

description.p: Whenever you regain hit points treat any dice rolled to determine the hit points you regain as having rolled their maximum value for you.

sheet.description: Whenever you regain hit points treat any dice rolled to determine the hit points you regain as having rolled their maximum value for you.

description.p: You can cast arms of Hadar once without using a warlock spell slot. You cannot do so again until you finish a long rest. When you cast arms of Hadar, each creature that fails the saving throw cannot move until the end of your next turn.

sheet.description: You can cast arms of Hadar without using a warlock spell slot. When you cast arms of Hadar, each creature that fails the saving throw cannot move until the end of your next turn.

description.p: You can cast cure wounds twice at its lowest level without expending a warlock spell slot, and regain the ability to do so after you finish a long rest.

sheet.description: You can cast cure wounds at its lowest level without expending a warlock spell slot

description.p: Once on each of your turns when you hit a creature with a cantrip, you can reduce that creature’s speed by 10 feet until the end of your next turn.

sheet.description: Once on each of your turns when you hit a creature with a cantrip, you can reduce that creature’s speed by 10 feet until the end of your next turn.

description.p: You can cast Tasha’s hideous laughter once without using a warlock spell slot. You cannot do so again until you finish a long rest.

sheet.description: You can cast Tasha’s hideous laughter without using a warlock spell slot.

description.p: You can cast disguise self at will, without expending a spell slot.

sheet.description: You can cast disguise self, without expending a spell slot.

description.p: You can cast silent image at will, without expending a spell slot or material components.

sheet.description: You can cast silent image, without expending a spell slot or material components.

description.p: Once on each of your turns when you hit a creature with a ranged attack cantrip, you can move that creature in a straight line 10 feet away from you.

sheet.description: Once on each of your turns when you hit a creature with a ranged attack cantrip, you can move that creature in a straight line 10 feet away from you.

description.p: You can cast bane once without using a warlock spell slot. You regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest.

sheet.description: You can cast bane without using a warlock spell slot.

description.p: You can cast expeditious retreat at will, without expending a spell slot or material components.

sheet.description: You can cast expeditious retreat, without expending a spell slot or material components.

description.p: 7th level
You can cast levitate on yourself at will, without expending a spell slot or material components.

sheet.description: You can cast levitate on yourself, without expending a spell slot or material components.

description.p: 7th level
You can cast compulsion once without using a warlock spell slot. You can’t do so again until you finish a long rest.

sheet.description: You can cast compulsion without using a warlock spell slot.

description.p: 7th level
You can cast find steed once without expending a spell slot. You can’t do so again until you finish a long rest.

sheet.description: You can cast find steed without expending a spell slot.

description.p: 7th level

As a bonus action, you can surround yourself with a magical aura that looks like buzzing flies. The aura includes your space, extends 5 feet from you in every direction, and is blocked by total cover. It lasts until you’re incapacitated or you dismiss it with a bonus action.

The aura grants you advantage on Intimidation (Charisma) checks but disadvantage on other Charisma checks. Any other creature that starts its turn in the aura takes poison damage equal to your Intelligence modifier (minimum of 0 damage).
Once you use this invocation, you can’t use it again until you finish a short or long rest.

sheet.description: You can surround yourself with a magical aura that looks like buzzing flies. The aura includes your space, extends 5 feet from you in every direction, and is blocked by total cover. The aura grants you advantage on Intimidation (Charisma) checks but disadvantage on other Charisma checks. Any other creature that starts its turn in the aura takes {{cloak-of-flies:damage}} points poison damage.

description.p: 7th level
You can cast ray of enfeeblement once without using a warlock spell slot. You can’t do so again until you finish a long rest.
Additionally, while you concentrate on ray of enfeeblement, you have advantage on Strength-based attack rolls and Strength checks.

sheet.description: You can cast ray of enfeeblement without using a warlock spell slot. Additionally, while you concentrate on ray of enfeeblement, you have advantage on Strength-based attack rolls and Strength checks.

description.p: 7th level
You can cast confusion once without using a warlock spell slot. You can’t do so again until you finish a long rest.

sheet.description: You can cast confusion without using a warlock spell slot.

description.p: 7th level

As a reaction when you take damage, you can entomb yourself in ice, which melts away at the end of your next turn. You gain 10 temporary hit points per warlock level, which take as much of the triggering damage as possible. You also gain vulnerability to fire damage, your speed drops to 0, and you are incapacitated. All of these effects end when the ice melts.
Once you use this invocation, you can’t use it again until you finish a short or long rest.

sheet.description: When you take damage, you can entomb yourself in ice, which melts away at the end of your next turn. You gain {{frozen-tomb:temp-hp}} temporary hit points per warlock level, which take as much of the triggering damage as possible. You also gain vulnerability to fire damage, your speed drops to 0, and you are incapacitated. All of these effects end when the ice melts.

description.p: 7th level

As an action, you gain the ability to see through solid objects to a range of 30 feet. Within that range, you have darkvision if you don’t already have it. This special sight lasts until the end of the current turn. During that time, you perceive objects as ghostly, transparent images.
Once you use this invocations, you can’t use it again until you finish a short or long rest.

sheet.description: You can see through solid objects to a range of 30 feet. Within that range, you have darkvision if you don’t already have it. This special sight lasts until the end of the current turn. During that time, you perceive objects as ghostly, transparent images.

description.p: 7th level
You can breathe underwater, and you gain a swimming speed equal to your walking speed.
You can also cast water breathing without expending a spell slot. Once you cast it using this invocation, you can’t do so again until you finish a long rest.

sheet.description: You can breathe underwater. You can also cast water breathing without expending a spell slot.

description.p: 7th level

As a bonus action, you cause a psychic disturbance around the target cursed by your Hex ability. When you do so, you deal psychic damage to the cursed target and each creature of your choice that you can see within 5 feet of it. The psychic damage equals your Intelligence modifier (minimum of 1 damage).
To use this invocation, you must be able to see the cursed target, and it must be within 30 feet of you.

sheet.description: You deal {{maddening-hex:damage}} points psychic damage to the cursed target of your Hex ability and each creature of your choice that you can see within 5 feet of it. You must be able to see the cursed target, and it must be within 30 feet of you.

description.p: 7th level
You can cast animate dead without expending a spell slot. You can do so twice, and regain both uses when you complete a long rest.

sheet.description: You can cast animate dead without expending a spell slot.

description.p: 7th level
You can cast slow once without using a warlock spell slot. You can’t do so again until you finish a long rest.

sheet.description: You can cast slow without using a warlock spell slot.

description.p: 7th level
When you are in an area of dim light or darkness, you can use an action to become invisible until you move or take an action or a reaction.

sheet.description: When you are in an area of dim light or darkness, you can become invisible until you move or take an action or a reaction.

description.p: 7th level
You can cast jump on yourself at will, without expending a spell slot or material components.

sheet.description: You can cast jump on yourself, without expending a spell slot or material components.

description.p: 7th level

As a bonus action, you can magically teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space you can see within 5 feet of the target cursed by your Hex ability. To teleport in this way, you must be able to see the cursed target.

sheet.description: You can teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space you can see within 5 feet of the target cursed by your Hex ability. To teleport in this way, you must be able to see the cursed target.

description.p: 7th level
You can cast moonbeam once without using a warlock spell slot. You can’t do so again until you finish a long rest.

sheet.description: You can cast moonbeam without using a warlock spell slot.

description.p: 7th level
You can cast polymorph once without using a warlock spell slot. You can’t do so again until you finish a long rest.

sheet.description: You can cast polymorph once without using a warlock spell slot.

description.p: 7th level

You can cast cloud of daggers once without using a warlock spell slot. You cannot do so again until you finish a long rest. As long as you concentrate on cloud of daggers, you can move the point the cube is centered on up to 30 feet as a bonus action on your turn.

sheet.description: You can cast cloud of daggers without using a warlock spell slot. As long as you concentrate on cloud of daggers, you can move the point the cube is centered on up to 30 feet as a bonus action on your turn.

description.p: 7th level
You can cast clairvoyance without expending a spell slot, and you don’t require material components for the spell when you cast it this way. You can’t do so again until you finish a long rest.

sheet.description: You can cast clairvoyance without expending a spell slot, and you don’t require material components for the spell when you cast it this way.

description.p: 7th level
You can cast bestow curse once without using a warlock spell slot. You can’t do so again until you finish a long rest.

sheet.description: You can cast bestow curse without using a warlock spell slot.

description.p: 7th level
You can cast freedom of movement once on yourself without expending a spell slot. You regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest.

sheet.description: You can cast freedom of movement on yourself without expending a spell slot.

description.p: 7th level

You can cast augury once without expending a spell slot, and without material components. When cast this way, you can gain advantage on one attack roll or ability check of your choice that you make in the next hour, if it relates to the course of action you received an omen for.
Once you cast augury this way, you can’t do so again until you finish a short or long rest.

sheet.description: You can cast augury without expending a spell slot, and without material components. When cast this way, you can gain advantage on one attack roll or ability check of your choice that you make in the next hour, if it relates to the course of action you received an omen for.

description.p: 12th level

Whenever you cast a spell with a range of Self using a warlock spell slot, choose one creature within 15 feet of you. The target must make a Wisdom saving throw against your warlock spell save DC. If they fail, they are charmed by you until the end of your next turn.

sheet.description: Whenever you cast a spell with a range of Self using a warlock spell slot, choose one creature within 15 feet of you. The target must make a Wisdom saving throw (save DC {{spellcasting:dc}}). If they fail, they are charmed by you until the end of your next turn.

description.p: 12th level
You can cast fly on yourself at will without expending a spell slot or material components.

sheet.description: You can cast fly on yourself without expending a spell slot or material components.

description.p: 12th level

You can cast hold monster at will - targeting a celestial, fiend, or elemental - without expending a spell slot or material components. You must finish a long rest before you can use this invocation on the same creature again.

sheet.description: You can cast hold monster at will - targeting a celestial, fiend, or elemental - without expending a spell slot or material components. You must finish a long rest before you can use this invocation on the same creature again.

description.p: 12th level
You can cast contingency once without using a warlock spell slot. You cannot do so again until you finish a long rest.

sheet.description: You can cast contingency without using a warlock spell slot.

description.p: 12th level
You can cast alter self at will, without expending a spell slot.

sheet.description: You can cast alter self without expending a spell slot.

description.p: 12th level
You can cast conjure elemental once without using a warlock spell slot. You can’t do so again until you finish a long rest.

sheet.description: You can cast conjure elemental without using a warlock spell slot.

description.p: 12th level
You can cast greater restoration without expending a spell slot or material components. You can’t do so again until you finish a long rest.

sheet.description: You can cast greater restoration without expending a spell slot or material components.

description.p: 12th level
You can cast muder of crows once without using a warlock spell slot. You can’t do so again until you finish a long rest.

sheet.description: You can cast muder of crows without using a warlock spell slot.

description.p: 12th level
You can cast invisibility at will, without expending a spell slot.

sheet.description: You can cast invisibility without expending a spell slot.

description.p: 12th level
You can cast arcane eye at will, without expending a spell slot.

sheet.description: You can cast arcane eye without expending a spell slot.

description.p: 12th level
You can cast speak with dead at will, without expending a spell slot.

sheet.description: You can cast speak with dead without expending a spell slot.

description.p: 12th level
You can see the true form of any shapechanger or creature concealed by illusion or transmutation magic while the creature is within 30 feet of you and within line of sight.

sheet.description: You can see the true form of any shapechanger or creature concealed by illusion or transmutation magic while the creature is within 30 feet of you and within line of sight.

description.p: 12th level
You can cast teleportation circle once without using a warlock spell slot. You can’t do so again until you finish a long rest.

sheet.description: You can cast teleportation circle once without using a warlock spell slot.

description.p: 17th level
You can cast plane shift once without expending a spell slot. You regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest.

sheet.description: ou can cast plane shift without expending a spell slot.

description.p: 17th level
Once during a long rest, you can cast dream without expending a spell slot. Casting this spell does not interfere with your rest.

sheet.description: You can cast dream without expending a spell slot. Casting this spell does not interfere with your rest.

description.p: 17th level
You no longer need to expend a spell slot when using your Hex ability.

sheet.description: You no longer need to expend a spell slot when using your Hex ability.

description.p: 17th level
You can ignore the verbal component of a warlock spell if it also has a somatic component. If the spell is on your bestowed spell list, it instead requires no components.

sheet.description: You can ignore the verbal component of a warlock spell if it also has a somatic component. If the spell is on your bestowed spell list, it instead requires no components.

description.p: 17th level
You can cast Mordenkainen’s magnificent mansion once per long rest without expending a spell slot.

sheet.description: You can cast Mordenkainen’s magnificent mansion without expending a spell slot.

description.p: 17th level
You can cast Otto’s irresistible dance once without using a warlock spell slot. You cannot do so again until you finish a long rest.

sheet.description: You can cast Otto’s irresistible dance without using a warlock spell slot.
